1.question: Tessa has 4 apples. Anita gave her 5 more. She needs 10 apples to make a pie. Does she have enough to make a pie?

3.question: Molly had 14 candles on her birthday cake. She grew older and got 6 more on her birthday cake. How old is Molly now?

2.question: Julia played tag with 12 kids on Monday. She played tag with 7 kids on Tuesday. How many kids did she play with altogether?

5.question: Charles found 6 pennies on his way to school. He also had 3 nickels already at home. How much money does he now have in all?

4.question: James ate 22 carrot sticks before dinner and 15 more after dinner. How many carrot sticks did he eat?
